title: Help pls looking for a light type
content:
Hello!  
Can you suggest any type that is light yet elegant? but not too feminin like helvetica neue.  
more like grandesign but more high-end look. haha.

 [‹ ID Typo Galega](http://web.archive.org/web/20081209030554/http:/typophile.com/node/52419 "Go to previous forum topic") [Slimmer than the normal stencil, but is there a base font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081209030554/http:/typophile.com/node/52440 "Go to next forum topic")
author: davekos

comments.content: You might find what you need in this list of [light fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20081209030554/http:/fontfeed.com/archives/extra-thin-ultra-light-fonts/).
